actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide further for uniform annual observances of certain legal public holidays on Monday.

summary.text: Makes American Business Day a legal holiday to be observed on the last Monday in April. Changes the date of Veterans' Day from November 11 to the fourth Monday in October.

titles.title: A bill to provide further for uniform annual observances of certain legal public holidays on Monday.
